column1: # This is the language file for CI interaction.

column2: "Should the CI be assigned to the project?"
"The duplicated CI is assigned to multiple projects. Please choose manually!"
"The entered value is already used by another CI"
"The selected CI Type does not allow assigned CIs!"
"Do you really want to delete this CI?"
"Do you really want to delete this CI and its Relations?"
"Do you really want to reset the CI?"
"Are you sure you want to perform the action?"
"Your browser does not support drag'n'drop file uploads."
"Please use the fallback form below to upload your files like in the olden days."
"You can't upload files of this type."
"Are you sure you want to cancel this upload?"
"You can not upload any more files."
"Are you sure you want to remove the file?"
"There is a file already. Would you like to override it?"
"Form timed out. Reopen the edit form and apply your changes."
"There was an error during the locking process. Your changes may be lost, please refresh the page when you are ready."
